games.notes: Despite low confidence (52.3%), model correctly predicted Mariners victory in tight playoff game

performance_notes: Despite being a low confidence prediction (52.3%), the model was correct
This was a close game (3-2), which explains the low confidence
Perfect example of playoff unpredictability - even 'uncertain' predictions can be right
Your 56.5% overall accuracy got a nice boost from this correct prediction
